resources.string: Filing a return is as easy as chatting
This is what you provided, you can always scroll up and edit.
Need Help? Call us on - Call us on 022-30038136 for FREE technical help. (Monday to Friday 10AM to 7PM)

It seems you have additional taxes payable. Kindly check your deductions properly. In case you still have taxes payable, we will be unable to proceed with filing of your tax return. Kindly login to www.hrblock.in to continue with your tax filing. Rest assured that data you keyed in here will be available in your account at https://tax.hrblock.in
